text: Antoni Krauze (4 January 1940 – 14 February 2018) was a Polish screenwriter and director. He studied at the National Film School in Łódź (1966).Antoni Krauze. filmpolski.pl He was born in Warsaw. Krauze was known for his 2011 movie, Black Thursday. He won an award at the Polish Film Festival in 2011 and FIPRESCI Prize at the Montréal World Film Festival in 2011.Awards. www.imdb.com Krauze died on 14 February 2018 in Warsaw of a heart attack at the age of 78. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1940 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Polish movie directors Category:Polish screenwriters Category:People from Warsaw
